attributes.action: how autism is seen by local authority housing departments
attributes.additional_details: Please help stop ignorence to children with autism by local authority housing . Children with autism need sutible accomendation , including their own room , an inclosed safe out door area and accomendation that the child and family are able to get in and out of . Please help this cause by signing my e petition , all mums , dads and careers lets be heard .
